speco.array

Class Array<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • speco.array.Array<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<T>, kopii.Copyable, Collection<T>

    public class Array<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Collection<T>, kopii.Copyable

    Title: Array

    Description: An array of objects (parameterized).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Array()
      Creates an array having an initial buffer with length 100
      Array(java.lang.Object buffer)
      Creates an array using the given buffer of elements
      Array(java.lang.Object buffer, int size)
      Creates an array using the given buffer of elements and the given initial size

      • add

        public boolean add(int index,
                   T data)
        Adds an element at the given position. Elements at positions index+1...size()-1 are moved one position ahead.
        Parameters:
        index - Position to be occupied by the new element
        data - Element that will be added into the Vector
        Returns:
        true If the element could be added at the given position, false otherwise
